name: Black&White
description:
I made this game for learn Construct 2, this  is my first game.

My original though is make a tiny puzzle game, with 4 color, like old gameboy game. Player can change color by black or white. 

It's still working on.

sound effects: http://www.noiseforfun.com

background music: https://onlinesequencer.net/666192
